00059 /* windows stuff */
00060 int rlwsa()
00061 {
00062 #ifdef RLWIN32
00063   static int first = 1;
00064   WORD    wVersionRequested;
00065   WSADATA wsadata;
00066   int     err;
00067 
00068   if(first == 1)
00069   {
00070 #ifdef IS_OLD_MSVCPP
00071     wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(1,1);
00072 #else
00073     wVersionRequested = MAKEWORD(2,0);
00074 #endif
00075     err = WSAStartup(wVersionRequested, &wsadata);
00076     if(err != 0)
00077     {
00078       ::printf("Startup error=%d on windows\n",err);
00079       exit(0);
00080     }
00081     first = 0;
00082   }
00083 #endif
00084   return 0;
00085 }
00086 
00087 rlSocket::rlSocket(const char *a, int p, int act)
00088 {
00089   rlwsa(); // init sockets on windows
00090   setAdr(a);
00091   port = p;
00092   active = act;
00093   s = -1;
00094   os = -1;
00095   first = 1;
00096   rl_ipversion = 4;
00097   memset(sockaddr,0,sizeof(sockaddr));
00098 }
00099 
00100 rlSocket::rlSocket(int socket)
00101 {
00102   adr[0] = '\0';
00103   port   = -1;
00104   active = 0;
00105   s      = socket;
00106   os     = -1;
00107   first  = 0;
00108   rl_ipversion = 4;
00109   memset(sockaddr,0,sizeof(sockaddr));
00110 }
00111 
00112 rlSocket::~rlSocket()
00113 {
00114   disconnect();
00115   if(os != -1 && active == 0)
00116   {
00117 #ifdef RLWIN32
00118     closesocket(os);
00119 #else
00120     close(os);
00121 #endif
00122   }
00123 }

00125 void rlSocket::setAdr(const char *a)
00126 {
00127   adr[0] = '\0';
00128   if(a == NULL) return;
00129   if((strlen(a)+1) > sizeof(adr)) return;
00130   strcpy(adr,a);
00131 }

00148 int rlSocket::read(void *buf, int len, int timeout)
00149 {
00150   int  i,ret;
00151   char *cbuf;
00152 
00153   if(s == -1) return -1;
00154   if(select(timeout) == 0) return 0; // timeout
00155 
00156   cbuf = (char *) buf;
00157   i = 0;
00158   while(i < len)
00159   {
00160     ret = recv(s,&cbuf[i],len-i,0);
00161     if(ret <= 0)
00162     {
00163       disconnect();
00164       return -1;
00165     }
00166     i += ret;
00167     if(i < len)
00168     {
00169       if(select(timeout) == 0) return 0; // timeout
00170     }
00171   }
00172 
00173   return i;
00174 }
00175 
00176 int rlSocket::readStr(char *buf, int len, int timeout)
00177 {
00178   int ret,i;
00179 
00180   if(s == -1) return -1;
00181   if(select(timeout) == 0) return 0; // timeout
00182 
00183   i = 0;
00184   while(1)
00185   {
00186 #ifdef RLWIN32
00187 tryagain:
00188 #endif
00189     ret = recv(s,&buf[i],1,0);
00190     if(ret <= 0)
00191     {
00192 #ifdef RLWIN32
00193       if(WSAEWOULDBLOCK == WSAGetLastError()) goto tryagain;
00194 #endif
00195       disconnect();
00196       buf[i] = '\0';
00197       return -1;
00198     }
00199     if(buf[i] == '\n')
00200     {
00201       buf[i+1] = '\0';
00202       return i+1;
00203     }
00204     if(i >= len-1)
00205     {
00206       buf[i+1] = '\0';
00207       return i+1;
00208     }
00209     i++;
00210   }
00211 }
00212 
00213 int rlSocket::write(const void *buf, int len)
00214 {
00215   int ret,bytes_left,first_byte;
00216   const char *cbuf;
00217 
00218   if(s == -1) return -1;
00219   cbuf = (char *) buf;
00220   bytes_left = len;
00221   first_byte = 0;
00222 
00223   while(bytes_left > 0)
00224   {
00225     ret = send(s,&cbuf[first_byte],bytes_left,MSG_NOSIGNAL);
00226     if(ret <= 0)
00227     {
00228       disconnect();
00229       return -1;
00230     }
00231     bytes_left -= ret;
00232     first_byte += ret;
00233   }
00234 
00235   return first_byte;
00236 }
00237 
00238 int rlSocket::connect()
00239 {
00240   int option;
00241   int ret;
00242 #ifdef __VMS
00243   size_t    socklen = sizeof(struct sockaddr);
00244 #else
00245   socklen_t socklen = sizeof(struct sockaddr);
00246 #endif
00247   struct sockaddr_in     localAddr;
00248   struct sockaddr_in     remoteAddr;
00249   struct hostent        *host;
00250   struct in_addr         RemoteIpAddress;
00251 #ifdef AF_INET6_IS_AVAILABLE
00252   struct addrinfo        hints0, hints1;
00253   struct addrinfo       *res, *ressave;
00254   int n;
00255   char portstr[32];
00256 #endif
00257 
00258   if(port <= 0)       return PORT_ERR;
00259   if(port >= 256*256) return PORT_ERR;
00260   if(active == 0)
00261   { // accept calls
00262     s = -1;
00263     if(rl_ipversion == 4)
00264     {
00265       if(first == 1)
00266       {
00267         // create a socket
00268         os = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_STREAM,0);
00269         if(os == -1) return SOCKET_ERR;
00270         // set socket options 
00271 #ifdef __VMS
00272         option = 1;
00273         if(setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_KEEPALIVE,&option,sizeof(option)) < 0)
00274         {
00275           return SETSOCKOPT_ERR;
00276         }
00277 #endif
00278         option = 1;
00279 #ifdef RLWIN32
00280         setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,(const char *) &option,sizeof(option));
00281 #else
00282         setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&option,sizeof(option));
00283 #endif
00284         // Bind our server to the agreed upon port number.
00285         memset(&localAddr,0,sizeof(localAddr));
00286         localAddr.sin_port = htons((short) port);
00287         localAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00288 bind:
00289         ret = bind(os, (struct sockaddr *) &localAddr, sizeof(localAddr));
00290         if(ret == -1)
00291         {
00292           rlwthread_sleep(1000);
00293           goto bind;
00294         }
00295         // Prepare to accept client connections.  Allow up to 5 pending 
00296         // connections.                                            
00297         ret = listen(os, 5);
00298         if(ret == -1) return LISTEN_ERR;
00299       }
00300       first = 0;
00301 
00302       // accept connections
00303       s = accept(os, (struct sockaddr *) &sockaddr[0], &socklen);
00304       if(s == -1) return ACCEPT_ERR;
00305     }
00306     else if(rl_ipversion == 6)
00307     {
00308 #ifdef AF_INET6_IS_AVAILABLE
00309       if(first == 1)
00310       {
00311         memset(&hints0,0,sizeof(hints0));
00312         hints0.ai_flags = AI_PASSIVE;
00313         //hints0.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00314         hints0.ai_family = AF_INET6;
00315         hints0.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00316         sprintf(portstr,"%d",port);
00317         //::printf("server getaddrinfo(%s,%s)\n", adr, portstr);
00318         n = getaddrinfo(adr, portstr, &hints0, &res);
00319         if(n != 0)
00320         {
00321 #ifndef RLWIN32
00322           ::printf("rlSocket:tcp_listen error for %s port=%s : %s\n", adr, portstr, gai_strerror(n));
00323 #endif
00324           return -1;
00325         }
00326         //::printf("done\n");
00327         ressave = res;
00328 bindv6:
00329         do
00330         {
00331           os = socket(res->ai_family, res->ai_socktype, res->ai_protocol);
00332           if(os < 0)                                            continue; // error, try next one
00333 #ifdef __VMS
00334           option = 1;
00335           if(setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_KEEPALIVE,&option,sizeof(option)) < 0)
00336           {
00337             return SETSOCKOPT_ERR;
00338           }
00339 #endif
00340           option = 1;
00341 #ifdef RLWIN32
00342           setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,(const char *) &option,sizeof(option));
00343 #else
00344           setsockopt(os,SOL_SOCKET,SO_REUSEADDR,&option,sizeof(option));
00345 #endif
00346           if(bind(os, res->ai_addr, res->ai_addrlen) == 0)      break;    // success
00347           s = os;
00348           disconnect();                                                   // bind error, close and try next one
00349         }
00350         while((res = res->ai_next) != NULL);
00351         if(res == NULL)                                                   // errno from final socket() or bind()
00352         {
00353           ::printf("warning: could not bind to port=%d\n", port);
00354           rlwthread_sleep(1000);
00355           goto bindv6;
00356         }
00357         // Prepare to accept client connections.  Allow up to 5 pending 
00358         // connections
00359         ret = listen(os, 5);
00360         freeaddrinfo(ressave);
00361         if(ret == -1) return LISTEN_ERR;
00362       }
00363       first = 0;
00364       // accept connections
00365       s = accept(os, (struct sockaddr *) &sockaddr[0], &socklen);
00366       if(s == -1) return ACCEPT_ERR;
00367 #else
00368       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR IPV6 not available on this platform\n");
00369 #endif
00370     }
00371     else
00372     {
00373       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR: rl_ipversion=%d not known\n", rl_ipversion);
00374     }
00375   } // end active == 0 
00376   else if(active == 1)
00377   {
00378     disconnect();
00379     //::printf("debug: adr=%s port=%d\n",adr,port);
00380     s = -1;
00381     if(rl_ipversion == 4)
00382     {
00383       os = socket(AF_INET,SOCK_STREAM,0);
00384       if(os == -1) return SOCKET_ERR;
00385       s = os;
00386 
00387       //::printf("debug: gethostbyname\n");
00388       // fill destblk structure 
00389       host = gethostbyname(adr);
00390       if(host == NULL)
00391       {
00392         // See if the host is specified in "dot address" form
00393         RemoteIpAddress.s_addr = inet_addr(adr);
00394         if(RemoteIpAddress.s_addr == INADDR_NONE)
00395         {
00396           s = -1;
00397           return INET_ADDR_ERR; // -1
00398         }
00399       }
00400       else
00401       {
00402         memcpy(&RemoteIpAddress,host->h_addr,host->h_length);
00403       }
00404 
00405       memset(&remoteAddr,0,sizeof(remoteAddr));
00406       remoteAddr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00407       remoteAddr.sin_port = htons((short) port);
00408       remoteAddr.sin_addr = RemoteIpAddress;
00409 
00410       //::printf("debug: connect\n");
00411       ret = ::connect(s, (struct sockaddr *) &remoteAddr, sizeof(remoteAddr));
00412       //::printf("debug: connect ret=%d\n",ret);
00413       if(ret == -1) 
00414       {
00415         s = -1;
00416         return CONNECT_ERR;
00417       }
00418     }
00419     else if(rl_ipversion == 6)
00420     {
00421 #ifdef AF_INET6_IS_AVAILABLE
00422       sprintf(portstr,"%d",port);
00423       memset(&hints1, 0, sizeof(hints1));
00424       hints1.ai_family = AF_UNSPEC;
00425       hints1.ai_socktype = SOCK_STREAM;
00426       n = getaddrinfo(adr, portstr, &hints1, &res);
00427       if(n != 0)
00428       {
00429 #ifndef RLWIN32
00430         ::printf("rlSocket:tcp_connect error for %s port=%s : %s\n", adr, portstr, gai_strerror(n));
00431 #endif
00432         return -1;
00433       }
00434       ressave = res;
00435       do
00436       {
00437         s = socket(res->ai_family, res->ai_socktype, res->ai_protocol);
00438         if(s < 0)                                            continue; // ignore this one
00439         if(::connect(s, res->ai_addr, res->ai_addrlen) == 0) break;    // success
00440         disconnect();                                                  // ignore this one
00441       }
00442       while((res = res->ai_next) != NULL);
00443       if(res == NULL) ::printf("rlSocket:tcp_connect error for %s port=%s\n", adr, portstr);
00444       freeaddrinfo(ressave);
00445 #else
00446       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR IPV6 not available on this platform\n");
00447 #endif
00448     }
00449     else
00450     {
00451       ::printf("rlSocket:ERROR: rl_ipversion=%d not known\n", rl_ipversion);
00452     }
00453   }
00454   return s;
00455 }
00456 
00457 int rlSocket::disconnect()
00458 {
00459   if(s != -1)
00460   {
00461 #ifdef RLWIN32
00462     closesocket(s);
00463 #else
00464     close(s);
00465 #endif
00466   }
00467   s = -1;
00468   return 0;
00469 }

00471 int rlSocket::isConnected()
00472 {
00473   if(s == -1) return 0;
00474   return 1;
00475 }
00476 
00477 int rlSocket::select(int timeout)
00478 {
00479   struct timeval timout;
00480   fd_set wset,rset,eset;
00481   int    ret,maxfdp1;
00482 
00483   if(timeout == 0) return 1;
00484   /* setup sockets to read */
00485   maxfdp1 = s+1;
00486   FD_ZERO(&rset);
00487   FD_SET (s,&rset);
00488   FD_ZERO(&wset);
00489   FD_ZERO(&eset);
00490   timout.tv_sec  =  timeout / 1000;
00491   timout.tv_usec = (timeout % 1000) * 1000;
00492 
00493   ret = ::select(maxfdp1,&rset,&wset,&eset,&timout);
00494   if(ret == 0) return 0; /* timeout */
00495   return 1;
00496 }

00498 int rlSocket::printf(const char *format, ...)
00499 {
00500   int ret;
00501   char message[rl_PRINTF_LENGTH]; // should be big enough
00502 
00503   va_list ap;
00504   va_start(ap,format);
00505   ret = rlvsnprintf(message, rl_PRINTF_LENGTH - 1, format, ap);
00506   va_end(ap);
00507   if(ret < 0) return ret;
00508   return write(message,strlen(message));
00509 }

00520   return rl_ipversion;
